rules: Rule1: If excavation was completed during period1, then either person1 made findings during period1 or person1 made findings during period2.
Rule2: Person3 is either a museum curator or a university researcher.
Rule3: Provided that person3 is a university researcher, then if artifact material1 is analyzed, it is cataloged.
Rule4: Whenever a security system is installed at site1, artifact material1 is not lost.
Rule5: Provided that person1 is a researcher, then person1 is an excavator.

Rule6: Either publication about material1 is pending, or if it is not the case that the failure of lab analysis being performed on material1 to imply carbon dating was performed on material1 leads to dating results not being inconclusive, then dating results for material1 are confirmed.
Rule7: If fieldwork was documented during period1, then findings were published during period1.
Rule8: Under the condition that person4 is a journal editor, if academic approval for material1 is granted, then peer review for material1 is completed.
Rule9: Either person4 is a journal editor, or person4 is a conference organizer.
Rule10: Provided that person4 is a conference organizer, then if academic approval for material1 is granted, peer review for material1 is completed.
Rule11: If person1 made findings during period1, then whenever person1 is an excavator, person1 discovers material1.
Rule12: Under the condition that person1 made findings during period2, then if person1 is an excavator, person1 discovers material1.
Rule13: If person2 is a team member, then either person1 made findings during period1 or person1 made findings during period2.
Rule14: Either person2 is a team member, or person1 is the team leader.
Rule15: Whenever person1 is the team leader, person1 is the site supervisor.
Rule16: Either funding was approved for period1, or if person1 is the site supervisor, then either person1 made findings during period1 or person1 made findings during period2.

Rule17: If it is not the case that either funding was approved for period2 or provided that person1 is the team leader then person1 made findings during period1 or person1 made findings during period2, then excavation was halted during period1.
Rule18: If it is not the case that if person3 is the museum curator then artifact material1 is displayed, then artifact material1 is lost.
Rule19: If it is not the case that if lab analysis was performed on material1 then carbon dating was performed on material1, then dating results for material1 are inconclusive.
Rule20: Under the condition that it is not the case that if findings are published during period1 then excavation is reported during period1, academic approval for material1 is granted.
Rule21: If it is not the case that if findings are published during period1 then excavation is reported during period1, then peer review for material1 is not completed.
Rule22: If it is not the case that whenever person1 is an excavator then person1 discovers material1, then lab analysis was performed on material1.

Rule23: If it is not the case that provided that person1 is the team leader then either person1 made findings during period1 or person1 made findings during period2, then fieldwork was documented during period1.

Rule24: Whenever it is not the case that if person1 is the team leader then either person1 made findings during period1 or person1 made findings during period2, then excavation was not reported during period1.
Rule25: If it is not the case that if person1 is the team leader then excavation was completed during period1, then artifact material1 was analyzed.

Rule26: If it is not the case that if it is not the case that if lab analysis was performed on material1 then carbon dating was performed on material1 then dating results are not inconclusive, then dating results for material1 are not confirmed.
Rule27: Whenever excavation at site1 is not active, person1 is a researcher.
Rule28: Provided that excavation at site1 is not active, then person1 did not discover material1.
facts: Fact1: A security system was installed at site1.
Fact2: Funding was not approved for period2.
Fact3: Excavation was not halted during period1.
Fact4: Artifact material1 was not cataloged.
Fact5: Artifact material1 was not displayed.
Fact6: Carbon dating was not performed on material1.
Fact7: Publication about material1 is not pending.
Fact8: Funding was not approved for period1.
